description: As a follow-up to Prime Minister's exhortation to Secretaries to come up with ideas for transformative change in various areas of governance, two Groups of Secretaries presented their ideas and suggestions on (a) Innovative Budgeting and Effective Implementation (b) Swachh Bharat and Ganga Rejuvenat…
caption: narendramodi.in
message: Two groups of secretaries presented their ideas today. The first group focussed on Innovative Budgeting and Effective Implementation. The second group of secretaries talked about Swachh Bharat and Ganga Rejuvenation, core focus areas for our Govt. http://nm-4.com/ocvc
